User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the AI Rythu Mitra application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

phoneNumber.description: User's phone number, used for authentication.

farmSize.description: Size of the user's farm in acres.

cropsCultivated.description: List of crops currently cultivated by the user.

SoilReport.title: SoilReport
SoilReport.description: Represents a soil health report submitted by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the soil report.

date.description: Date the soil sample was taken.

latitude.description: Latitude of the soil sample location.

longitude.description: Longitude of the soil sample location.

organicCarbon.description: Organic Carbon content of the soil (%).

CropData.title: CropData
CropData.description: Represents historical and predicted data for a specific crop.

id.description: Unique identifier for the crop data entry.

cropName.description: Name of the crop (e.g., Rice, Wheat).

location.description: Geographic location for the data (e.g., district, state).

year.description: Year for which the data is relevant.

yield.description: Yield of the crop in tons per hectare.

price.description: Market price of the crop in rupees per quintal.

rainfall.description: Average rainfall during the crop season.

IoTData.title: IoTData
IoTData.description: Represents data collected from IoT sensors deployed in farms.

id.description: Unique identifier for the IoT data entry.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the data was recorded.

temperature.description: Temperature reading from the sensor (in Celsius).

soilMoisture.description: Soil moisture level from the sensor (percentage).

Transaction.title: Transaction
Transaction.description: Represents a transaction between a farmer and a buyer in the marketplace.

cropName.description: Name of the crop being transacted.

quantity.description: Quantity of the crop transacted (in kg).

pricePerKg.description: Price per kilogram of the crop.

SubsidyAlert.title: SubsidyAlert
SubsidyAlert.description: Represents an alert for a government subsidy program relevant to farmers.

id.description: Unique identifier for the subsidy alert.

eligibilityCriteria.description: Eligibility criteria for the subsidy program.

applicationDeadline.description: Application deadline for the subsidy program.

linkToDetails.description: Link to the official details of the subsidy program.

AiLog.title: AiLog
AiLog.description: Represents a log entry for AI-powered operations (crop recommendation, pest detection).

id.description: Unique identifier for the AI log entry.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the AI operation was performed.

operationType.description: Type of AI operation (e.g., cropRecommendation, pestDetection).

inputData.description: Input data provided to the AI model (e.g., soil data, image URL).

outputData.description: Output data generated by the AI model (e.g., recommended crops, detected pests).

modelVersion.description: Version of the AI model used for the operation.

success.description: Indicates whether the AI operation was successful.

errorMessage.description: Error message if the AI operation failed.

WeeklyReport.title: WeeklyReport
WeeklyReport.description: Represents an AI-generated weekly farm report.

summary.description: Text summary of the week's activities and recommendations.

audioSummaryUrl.description: URL to the voice summary of the report.

mapDataUrl.description: URL to NDVI map image or spraying path data.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a batch of produce for traceability.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. User ID is used for path-based ownership.

/users/{userId}/soil_reports/{soilReport.description: Stores soil reports submitted by users. Enforces path-based ownership (User 1:N SoilReport).

/crop_data/{cropDataId}.description: Stores historical and predicted crop data. This collection is intended for admin read/write, client read-only.

/iot_data/{iotDataId}.description: Stores data collected from IoT sensors. This data could be associated with a user's farm, but without explicit user association in the schema, it remains a global collection.

/transactions/{transactionId}.description: Stores transaction data between farmers and buyers. Consider creating subcollections under user to reflect 'my sales' vs 'my purchases'.

/users/{userId}/subsidy_alerts/{subsidyA.description: Stores subsidy alerts relevant to a user. Path-based ownership (User 1:N SubsidyAlert).

/users/{userId}/ai_logs/{aiLogId}.description: Stores logs of AI-powered operations performed for a user. Path-based ownership (User 1:N AiLog).

/users/{userId}/weekly_reports/{reportId.description: Stores AI-generated weekly reports for a user.

/users/{userId}/drone_missions/{missionI.description: Stores drone operation details for a user.

/products/{productId}.description: Stores product data for supply chain traceability.
